system.effect:
Oneiromancy grants the caster a dream which unveils secrets and events of the past and present. A caster can perform the ritual alone.
It requires a Ritual Casting check to witness events that have occurred previously and a more difficult DC to witness events that are occurring at the moment. Oneiromancy can be detected by Mages using Magic Training.
The Oneiromancer can also guide a number of people equal to their Ritual Crafting skill value to share their enlightening dream. 
To do this, the oneiromancer must make a bond with the people they want to enlighten. This requires the participants to answer a series of personal questions, as truthfully as possible. 
The dream lasts for the duration of the ritual.
